decks.notes: The deck focuses on maintaining control over the game by utilizing a combination of counter spells, removal, and card advantage. Snapcaster Mage and Tasigur, the Golden Fang provide additional value by recycling spells and generating card advantage. Ancestral Vision and Serum Visions help dig for the necessary answers while Cryptic Command and Kolaghan's Command offer flexibility in dealing with threats. Lightning Bolt serves as cheap removal and a win condition, while Creeping Tar Pit and other lands provide creature threats. Overall, the deck aims to control the game and outvalue opponents with efficient spells and versatile threats.

The deck is focused on aggressive play by utilizing cards like Noble Hierarch and Birds of Paradise to ramp up mana for powerful creatures like Knight of the Reliquary and Tireless Tracker. Spell Queller and Collected Company provide disruptive elements to control the game tempo, while cards like Selfless Spirit and Scavenging Ooze offer protection and graveyard hate. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of efficient creatures and disruptive spells, maintaining pressure throughout the game.

The deck focuses on playing efficient threats and disruption spells to pressure opponents quickly while disrupting their game plan. It utilizes powerful creatures like Tarmogoyf and Siege Rhino alongside disruptive spells like Thoughtseize and Inquisition of Kozilek to control the game's pace. The deck also has access to strong removal spells like Path to Exile and Abrupt Decay to deal with opposing threats. Additionally, it has access to graveyard recursion with Lingering Souls and can generate card advantage with cards like Grim Flayer and Liliana of the Veil.

The deck focuses on playing disruptive creatures like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Leonin Arbiter to slow down the opponent while applying pressure with creatures like Restoration Angel and Blade Splicer. Aether Vial is used to cheat creatures into play quickly, while land destruction cards like Tectonic Edge and Ghost Quarter disrupt the opponent's mana base. The deck aims to control the game by taxing the opponent's resources and using flicker effects to generate additional value from enter the battlefield abilities.

The deck focuses on utilizing cards like Thoughtseize, Inquisition of Kozilek, and Collective Brutality to disrupt the opponent's hand and board while ramping up the power of Death's Shadow by lowering your own life total. Tarmogoyf and Street Wraith provide additional threats, while cards like Liliana of the Veil and Traverse the Ulvenwald offer versatility and card advantage. The deck is designed to apply early and consistent pressure on the opponent while maintaining control through removal spells like Abrupt Decay and Dismember, ultimately aiming to close out the game quickly and aggressively.

The key concept of this Eldrazi Aggro deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with fast, powerful creatures like Thought-Knot Seer, Reality Smasher, and Drowner of Hope. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy with cards like Path to Exile and Engineered Explosives while ramping up mana with Eldrazi Temple and Noble Hierarch. The use of Eldrazi Displacer and Eternal Witness provides versatility and consistency in maintaining board control. Overall, the goal is to apply early pressure and maintain a strong board presence to secure victory.

Utilizing the synergy between various cards like Mishra's Bauble and Street Wraith, this deck aims to aggressively reduce its own life total to pump up the powerhouse Death's Shadow. With disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Inquisition of Kozilek to control the opponent's hand, along with efficient removal like Tarfire and Abrupt Decay, the deck is able to put pressure on the opponent quickly and efficiently. The inclusion of Tarmogoyf and Liliana of the Veil rounds out the deck's strategy for a strong and consistent aggro game plan.

This Abzan Aggro deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's hand with spells like Thoughtseize and Inquisition of Kozilek, while also utilizing efficient aggro creatures like Tarmogoyf, Grim Flayer, and Dark Confidant to apply pressure on the opponent. The deck also includes versatile removal spells like Path to Exile and Abrupt Decay to deal with opposing threats. Additionally, Lingering Souls provides a constant stream of flying tokens to further pressure the opponent. Overall, the key concept of the deck is to disrupt the opponent's game plan while deploying threats to close out the game quickly.

This deck focuses on utilizing a combination of efficient removal spells and hand disruption to control the board while deploying threats that can quickly close out the game. By disrupting the opponent's strategy and applying pressure with powerful creatures like Tarmogoyf and Dark Confidant, the deck aims to maintain a proactive game plan that punishes slower or more reactive strategies. The mana base is built to support a variety of color requirements, allowing for flexibility in playing powerful cards like Liliana of the Veil and Chandra, Torch of Defiance.

This deck aims to control the game through a combination of removal spells, counterspells, and board wipes while assembling the Thopter-Sword combo to generate a steady stream of flying creatures and life gain. The deck also utilizes the Gifts Ungiven package to tutor for key cards like Unburial Rites and Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite to close out the game. The main strategy is to disrupt the opponent's game plan while establishing a dominant board presence to secure the win.

The deck focuses on using Faerie creatures and disruptive spells to control the tempo of the game and outvalue the opponent. By utilizing counter spells like Mana Leak and Cryptic Command, removal spells like Go for the Throat and Murderous Cut, along with Faerie synergies like Spellstutter Sprite and Mistbind Clique, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while building up incremental advantage with cards like Bitterblossom and Ancestral Vision. The deck also utilizes versatile creatures like Vendilion Clique and Snapcaster Mage to further control the game and close out the match.

The deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly using the Urza lands and Eldrazi Temple to play powerful Eldrazi creatures ahead of schedule. Chalice of the Void is used to disrupt the opponent's game plan, while Warping Wail and Dismember offer removal options. Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger and Reality Smasher serve as powerful finishers, with Thought-Knot Seer providing disruption and card advantage. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with efficient threats and disruption, utilizing the Eldrazi creatures to quickly close out the game.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize the graveyard as a resource to quickly and consistently bring back powerful creatures like Prized Amalgam and Bloodghast. Cards like Life from the Loam, Faithless Looting, and Cathartic Reunion help fill the graveyard while also providing card advantage. The Dredge mechanic allows for efficient self-milling, enabling the deck to quickly assemble powerful combinations of creatures and spells to overwhelm opponents. The deck's goal is to utilize these graveyard synergies to create explosive turns and win the game through repeated creature recursion and burn damage.

This deck aims to quickly establish a board presence with efficient creatures like Noble Hierarch and Knight of the Reliquary, supported by cards like Collected Company and Path to Exile for removal. The inclusion of cards like Spell Queller and Voice of Resurgence also disrupts opponents' strategies and adds versatility. The deck's mana base allows for consistent access to different colors of mana, while cards like Retreat to Coralhelm and Gavony Township provide additional synergies to further strengthen the board presence and overwhelm opponents in a aggressive manner.

The deck is focused on assembling the combo of Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle and Scapeshift to deal massive amounts of damage. It uses ramp spells like Explore and Farseek to accelerate the mana base and allows for quick setup of Valakut triggers with Primeval Titan and Sakura-Tribe Elder. Anger of the Gods provides a board wipe option while Lightning Bolt offers versatile removal. Search for Tomorrow and Khalni Heart Expedition help set up the combo, making the deck a lethal threat in the mid to late game.

This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells to deal damage directly to the opponent. By efficiently using low-cost creatures like Goblin Guide and Monastery Swiftspear, along with powerful burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Lava Spike, the deck aims to win the game as fast as possible before the opponent has a chance to stabilize. The inclusion of cards like Atarka's Command and Boros Charm provide additional versatility and reach to push through the opponent's defenses and secure the win.
